website_summaries.verdict: This rotating, anti-wrapping flagpole can help prevent your flag from ripping in high winds.
pros: Extremely easy to assemble and no-fuss packaging
Simple design yet highly durable in most weather conditions
Rotating pole helps extend the life of your flag by preventing it from wrapping around the pole
cons: Some buyers find the plastic clip holes break due to the metal flag clips

customer_reviews.title: Want a Flagpole That Will Last? Look Elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: This flag barely lasted me a year. Upon taking it down for the winter, I found one of the plastic hooks snapped, another on the verge of breaking, and then as I set it down, about 20 small balls popped out of the pole near where the hooks connect to the aluminum pole. This spilled all over the floor, and there are probably some still hiding from me - a bit concerning given how a baby could find and swallow them rather easily. I'm disappointed in the product and wonder how the company responds to such reports on their products. Not sure if they'll stand behind this.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, not heavy duty. Easily damaged by wind.
customer_reviews.text: While these look nice, they are not "heavy duty". We had one of three we put up get bent in a strong, but not unusual wind after just a couple of day's use with a sewn nylon American flag. They are more ornamental than useful. Also note that these are thicker (bigger diameter, not stronger) than many small flagpoles. We had to replace our flagpole holders to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Winston

customer_reviews.title: More Quality Control Needed!
customer_reviews.text: Waited with anticipation for this flag pole. Was extremely disappointed when I opened tthe package and realized that the tiny pings I was hearing were ball-bearings hitting my garage floor! The pole was also missing one flag adjustable collar! The broken clip was there, but no collar ring! I jerryrigged my old flag pole to make it work. The pole itself is very sturdy and fits well into holder. Somebody did not inspect this item before shipping! I am not recommending this product and gave it two stars only because it appears to be sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ben E.

customer_reviews.title: A Sturdy Flag Pole That Keeps Old Glory Waving Proud
customer_reviews.text: This flag pole is well made and very nice looking. I've paired it with a bracket from FlagBracketPA.com which allows me to mount the pole to my vinyl posts without drilling holes. The flag pole is sturdy. I've observed its performance in high wind gusts that made it look like it would break. It simply withstood the force of the wind. I've also observed it spin/rotate when the flag was wrapped around it. The flag unfurled and continued to wave full and proud
customer_reviews.author: A Orwig

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: This by far is the best flag pole I've ever owned. Does exactly what it's supposed to. It got really old untangling my American Flag every time the wind blew and moderate to high winds are frequent here in West Central Illinois. You can't go wrong with this pole, just be sure to attach your flag properly to it and you're good to go. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Lacks Sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: The is easy to install and assemble. Unfortunately, it lacks sturdiness/durability. Our Flag was purchased in 2013 and continues strong. Our flag pole was purchased in March of 2017 and has broken where the two sections join. The problem appears to be that the "connector section" is of some sort of plastic/rosin. One suspects that if the "connector" was of metal it would last several years. The additional cost for a metal connector mgiht be $5 but that is a small addition to the price of a flag pole advertising itself as sturdy. ..... very disappointing! ! !
customer_reviews.author: Son of Clovis

customer_reviews.title: Placing the bottom grommet clip on the top half which turns results in a significant sag in the flag and looks bad. Sending it back
customer_reviews.text: Does not for a standard 3 x 5 flag with grommets. Due to the too short length of the top half of the poles which turns, the bottom grommet ends up on the stationary portion, negating the function of the twisting joint. Placing the bottom grommet clip on the top half which turns results in a significant sag in the flag and looks bad. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Wells

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t include flagpole HOLDER!
customer_reviews.text: So who would order a flagpole with no way to actually hang it up on your porch post or tree? It never dawned on me that this wouldn’t be included, and there isn’t a note in the description saying so. My husband is now making one from wood in his shop- not everyone has this capability. No idea if it actually spins or not. I thought this was similar to one I’ve had for years and loved (and I wanted American made...!), but it’s definitely not the same design. Let’s hope it works.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A.Hoops,Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: This flagpole was quite expensive not to include the bracket so I order this pole and the bracket for fathers day gift.. the pole made it the bracket is lost somewhere in BFE so the gift is unusable for now. My husband does like the color and the large gold dome at the top of the pole it says it is tangle free but since it can't be installed I can not comment on that. I just think for a pole that expensive the bracket should be included
customer_reviews.author: Martie K

customer_reviews.title: None better for vertical display
customer_reviews.text: We needed a couple of poles to display 3'x5' nylon flags at the front corners of a clan tent. Tried several others but the flags were constantly wrapping themselves around the poles. We've been using these poles at Highland Games for 3 years with nary a problem, even in variable winds upwards of 10 mph. Easy to set up, take down and store. Nothing better! FYI, for mounting the pole fits smoothly into a 1" PVC pipe.
customer_reviews.author: Willie B.

customer_reviews.title: Best Flagpole I Could Find
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these flagpoles. I keep adding them so I can easily change flags I am flying without having to undo the clips from the grommets (a real first world problem, yes). They work as advertised, it is a rare day when the flag is not flying as intended. Tangles almost never happen, and the pole is mostly very well made. The sliding nylon ring for the bottom clip of the flag could be a bit sturdier, but it has yet to break or cause a problem. I am happy with all three of these poles.
customer_reviews.author: spiritualufo

customer_reviews.title: No tangles.
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST flag pole I have ever had. I did not believe the "no wrap" because my other ones have said that too. We get really heavy winds near the shore in Delaware. -No tangles.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Rio

customer_reviews.title: Usually Works OK
customer_reviews.text: Began using this flag pole about 6-7 months ago. For the first few months it worked perfectly. Flag never got tangled. The pole was always able to spin sufficiently to allow the flag to hang properly. However, lately I find that especially on windy days I need to untangle the flag as the spinner is not quite working like it used to. FYI-my flag flies daily, so this pole gets a lot of use. I would not say I'm dissatisfied but perhaps I am a bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Nice flag pole - for a while.
customer_reviews.text: Pole goes together great, very sturdy. The only issue I have is that the clip retaining ring is plastic and the clip is metal and will break the plastic leaving your flag flapping in the wind. Will have to buy an extra piece now to put flag back up. UPDATE: The flag pole broke where the pole goes in to the bracket mount. After constant flapping of the 3 x 5 flag in the wind, the pole finally gave way.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Rings are plastic and lasted 8 months.
customer_reviews.text: This company could and should change to aluminum rings. Charge $10 more and the pole would be better. The rings both broke off and my flag is long gone. 8 months isn't long enough and I'll try and see if they replace my flag but I don't think they will.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect spinning flag-pole... FINALLY!
customer_reviews.text: Far exceeds my expectations and hopes! This spinning flag-pole will hold a large (3x5) flag against a strong south/southwest wind, and will prevent Old Glory from furling on the house gutter or being damaged. Also recommend it to be paired with the Anley Multi-Position Flag-Pole Mounting Bracket for a crisp, clean, display appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Working Ghostwriter

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it’s durable
customer_reviews.text: It looks good and works well, but I’m not convinced it’s durable. We'll see. Suspicions confirmed. Yesterday, the lower nylon clip broke in high wind and heavy rain. In fairness, I suspect the flag isn't designed for 24-7 use. It's fine for occasional use, and is tangle-free, light weight, and easy to handle, but if you want to fly a flag 24-7, this isn't the one.
customer_reviews.author: John K

customer_reviews.title: I liked this pole at first
customer_reviews.text: I liked this pole at first, but after a few months my heavy-duty outdoor flag began wrap itself around the pole instead of spinning. Still, it was more functional than an older wooden pole. However, one of the plastic mounting rings broke off completely during a minor wind storm recently and the pole is now useless.
customer_reviews.author: JL Miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not strong enough
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice pole but not strong enough for my American flag. I use a 3x5 flag with this pole and in only 3 months the pole is bending at the base and the setscrew pushed right thru the pole itself. See picture.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Cox

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, broke after 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: Metal clips that attach to flag CONSTANTLY come loose leaving one end of the flag attached while the other flaps wildly in the wind. This was bothersome, but I kept at it. However,6 months after purchasing, the plastic clip that attaches the crappy metal clips to the flag pole broke. Waste of money, cheap construction.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Pole sections cannot be screwed together
customer_reviews.text: This is a rather light duty pole, in two pieces. It screws together. Unfortunately, the threaded insert for the bottom section was manufactured with a blob of glue below the plastic insert which prevented the top section from being inserted, and screwed in place. I resolved this using a thin chisel to dig out the blob. However, someone without the tools or interest would have a problem, as the pole would be unusable. Also, the top section of the pole rotates easily, so buying separate rotating mounting rings is a waste of money. This is not clear in the descriptions, or the bundling options. Why bundle something that duplicates another item in the bundle?
customer_reviews.author: Jim S

customer_reviews.title: One outta four ain't bad
customer_reviews.text: Used these Flag Poles on the back of our Fire Apparatus during during our Fourth of July Parade. Only had an issue with one of the Flag poles. The Top plastic ring where the Flag hooks to broke after only one use. The others were fine. Overall, the Flag Poles are decent enough and allows the Flag to fly freely.
customer_reviews.author: David Smith

customer_reviews.title: it really is a very nice system
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased the flag pool system I bought from amazon is very nice and very easy to install.I placed it on the side of my house that gets a lot of wind.after two weeks it's still holding up and just is great THANKS Todd Heywood PS I have a very heavy 3' X 5' sewn stars and and strips.Wow nice
customer_reviews.author: Todd W. Heywood

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same flagpole we purchased a year and a half ago; that one, although it did snap after 18 months, had a metal liner where the two parts came together. This is just plastic and I can't imagine it lasting more than a minute in a stiff breeze. We always took the other one inside when the wind was whipping, but this thing bows from just the weight of the "Open" flag in a dead calm. Waste of money. They may have saved money by removing the metal from the design, but they lost this customer.
customer_reviews.author: David Durham

customer_reviews.title: good looking pole but for that kind of money should ...
customer_reviews.text: Couldn"t join the top and bottom with parts as sent, had to tape the bottom pole and jam it into the top pole, see others have had same problem, 1st time I've written a negative review after over a thousand Amazon purchases. good looking pole but for that kind of money should have worked.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I had to retire my old 5' wooden flag pole that was supposed to be of the "no-wrap" variety, though not so much... This, however, is the genuine article. That extra foot makes a difference in visibility from the street, it is silent in comparison with my wooden pole, and the few times the flag has wrapped around the pole, before I have a chance to adjust it, it rights itself. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: M. Papaconstandinou

customer_reviews.title: The two attachment points swivel nicely to keep the flag from wrapping up around the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have two old wooden flag poles that need retired. One lost it's lower ring that attaches the flag to the pole. This pole is very attractive and light weight. The two attachment points swivel nicely to keep the flag from wrapping up around the pole. So far, so good. I recommend this pole, and the seller for a good experience. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Dale H. Stein Jr.

customer_reviews.title: It's a grand old flagpole!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, was I impressed when I got this flagpole. I did comparison shopping for similar products on the Target, Home Depot and Walmart websites, and the flagpoles were far more expensive and don't do what this one does. The top part of the flagpole rotates to prevent the flag from tangling. It also comes with a removable plastic clip so the flagpole can be used with either flags with two holes; or flags that only have a tab at the top. I'm truly happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Galassini

customer_reviews.title: the BEST! I've tested many
customer_reviews.text: This is the best flag pole I've ever bought. I've bought a lot of them but what sets this one apart is it's strength against winds and especially it's rotating pole that prevents the flag from tangling. With other poles I would have to untangle my flag at least once a day. Since this one has been up for over a week, I haven't once had to untangle the flag.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great during Spring, Summer, Fall
customer_reviews.text: Product was well built and lasted us nearly 13 months without tangling the flag once! I really liked the design and not having to fix the flag or have it being torn. Unfortunately, it didn't survive the first few freezing/snowfall days this year. The top plastic ring snapped off where the metal clip attaches and doesn't look replaceable. I'd buy again, but make sure to bring inside for storage in October.
customer_reviews.author: SwiftSTi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and prevents the flag from wrapping
customer_reviews.text: We bought this flag pole to hang a flag on the front of our house. It is easy to assemble and attach a flag to. It works really well and prevents our flag from wrapping around the pole. It has held up to fairly strong winds so far. We have only had it for about a month so I can't comment on the longterm quality but so far no issues. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Medicguy

customer_reviews.title: Great pole but flimsy plastic ring
customer_reviews.text: I have really like the way my flag stays untangled. The parts that spin are unique and very effective. However, the ring that attaches the bottom of the flag to the pole is plastic and not up to the task of heavier winds. Recently the ring snapped and rendered the flag pole useless.
customer_reviews.author: Lozsgo

customer_reviews.title: Read please if this could help you
customer_reviews.text: I love this pole but the regular polyester flags will still get tangled you need a little heavier material on the flags for me the light polyester kept getting tangled so I bought another flag that was heavy nylon and have not tangled up for me if you are trying to hang up cotten flags I have never tired but would it hold up no I don't think it would for all day use but still a good pole for lighter use than Cotten
customer_reviews.author: Zack grogan

customer_reviews.title: Cannot handle wind, company has no contact information
customer_reviews.text: Bought the flag in April, broke about two weeks later. Couldn't find contact information for the company but it was within 30 days so Amazon replaced it no questions asked. It is now August and it has broken beyond repair and there is still no way to contact the company. The offer a "1 year Satisfaction Guarantee" but i am unable to speak to them about it. Product has not been sturdy, I take it down anytime there will be winds of 20mph and it still cannot handle the stress of low winds. Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Layten Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Strong, handsome pole
customer_reviews.text: Strong, sturdy pole. Looks very good, with satin finish pole and high polished ball on the end. I have a 4' x 6' flag on it and it supports it well. The pole comes in two pieces, but the joint is very strong. The clips that hold the flag to it are great! They allow the flag to easily go completely around the pole without getting twisted up so the flag blows freely as it should. The bottom clip is adjustable so it can slide up or down the pole if you have a 3' x 5' flag. It's very classy and sets off the bright, white stars in the flag.
customer_reviews.author: M Harris

customer_reviews.title: No Mounting Base Included
customer_reviews.text: I guess the description is correct, you get a flag pole. I had assumed, since their other product that included a flag also included the mounting base, this one would include the base, it does not! The quality of the pole seems to be OK, but now I have to run to Home Depot and get a base, not a big deal, just pay attention better than me, if you need a complete flag pole set.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Montanez

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Perfect
customer_reviews.text: A good product that performs as advertised, even in the 40 MPH we recently had. I wasn't strong enough to get the two halves to screw together without pliers, but it didn't take much effort. The only product drawback is the design does not have a recessed area for the pole mounting screw to nestle into. Therefore the pole paint gets scratched off at that point.
customer_reviews.author: RSD

customer_reviews.title: First pole didn't last long. Hoping replacement does.
customer_reviews.text: Don't normally leave reviews but this flag pole really disappointed me. First time using it with some light wind and the top bracket piece held by a plastic ring busted right off. Returning for a full refund. Update: American Signature was quick to reach out to me offering a replacement part. Once I receive this part, I'll update my review accordingly. Adding another star for Customer Service. I received my replacement parts and added two more stars because of the great customer service. I'll see how the flagpole holds up and update my review accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rath

customer_reviews.title: Nice flagpole, and it doesn't get twisted up
customer_reviews.text: Very nice flagpole! Slightly longer than the usual wooden ones from home depot,and a bit thicker, so it fits nicely in the flag holder. After 2 days of windy weather, have not had to untangle the flat, so it seems to be working. Flat attaches via 2 clips, one at the top and not adjustable, and the other anywhere on the pole you want. If you have a good quality flag, the clips are difficult to fit through the holes, and you'll need pliers to get it hooked up, but that problem is the same with every competitor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This flagpole is great! No more having to unfurl a flag or banner because of wind. The white finish and brass knob make an attractive addition to our front porch. A great purchase at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Towner

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a flag pole that keeps the flag waving and NOT wrapped around the pole. It is worth the extra dollars. Just get this one to begin with. It was so annoying to always see the flag twisted..but with this pole ...it has not happened. Also, it 5 feet - most flag poles online were 6 feet...too big.
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Didn't hold up
customer_reviews.text: We've had the pole since January. It is now nearing July. Both of the clips that hold the flag onto the pole have broken off. Cheap plastic. The pole is sturdy but if you can't attach a flag, what good is it?
customer_reviews.author: Raji' Mom

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: After having 2 of these poles in use for several months, the first high wind broke the plastic ring in the middle of the pole that the flag attaches to. Should be made out of metal instead of plastic!
customer_reviews.author: Eddie W. Kiplinger

customer_reviews.title: No more tangled flags!
customer_reviews.text: It works! My flag pole no longer gets tangled. It comes with clips so you can easily swap between different flags. It also allows you to adjust the position of the bottom clip so you can use different flag sizes. It is a little pricey compared to a cheapy flag pole and I was disappointed to find out it didn't come with a holder, but I believe it is worth it for the time spent untangling my flag on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: I really wan to recommend but...
customer_reviews.text: So I have bought 2 of these over last couple of years. They really do not tangle but both have bent. No hurricanes or tornadoes. Really disappointed I will look elsewhere for my next one
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Kinsella

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flag pole for home us
customer_reviews.text: Mounted the flag for the first time on the new pole on a very windy day and watched as It flew proudly without winding up on the pole. An excellent pole for home use! Would have assigned five stars, but I had to limprove how flag attached to the pole. With only the two flimsy clips provided, the flag sagged in the middle. Appearance of the pole could be improved, in my opinion, with a better looking finial. Sturdy, good quality flag pole. Used only one day, but I am confidant it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G. Kulvich

customer_reviews.title: Broken already!
customer_reviews.text: Only fair. Not heavy duty at all. Had it less than couple months before it broke!. Decided I'd return it but couldn't find shipping box long enough so I had to keep it. Threw original away because I didn't think I'd ever need to return this flag pole. Oh well! Lesson learned on expensive, cheaply made flagpole.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: This is ok, it keeps the flag from furling ...
customer_reviews.text: This is ok, it keeps the flag from furling but only part of the time. Problem is that once stuck, it almost never becomes unstuck without intervention which leaves me in the same situation. However I will say that I've had no issues with rust, paint peeling, or integrity of the pole in any fashion.
customer_reviews.author: R. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Plastic parts that erode in the sun
customer_reviews.text: Not bad product but the top plastic ring that holds the carabiner snapped after 7 months of use. I really don’t want to have to buy a new flagpole every 6 months.....
customer_reviews.author: Chad Nichol

customer_reviews.title: Lot of plastic parts
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully this will last, the post seems like it will be fine but there are a lot of plastic parts. Got this for the fourth, can't wait to put it up for the year.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality - Broke in Less Than 4 Months
customer_reviews.text: Had this up on my house for less than 4 months before it snapped in half. A complete waste of money, considering it did not even make it through one season of use.
customer_reviews.author: lk

customer_reviews.title: Order this flag pole if you don’t want to hang a flag!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think I’ve ever written a bad review, but I’m beyond fed up with this flag pole. I ordered it in August and was waiting to put it up this spring. First the poles wouldn’t screw together...The company sent a new pole section that did work and I’ll give them credit for that. Now I find the bottom plastic flag attachment is broken before I even get the flag attached. It’s also made in China and not an American product. I
customer_reviews.author: A. K.

customer_reviews.title: Too short for me.....
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product but I wish they had options on the length of the pole. I need one about a foot longer as the flag gets caught on my "tile" roof. Otherwise, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Romanten

customer_reviews.title: residential flag pole for wall mounting.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic clip holders. One clip broke while removing wrapping. After inspection I realized that these would never stand the test of time in any case. Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: D. T. Gilmartin

customer_reviews.title: Lasted just over a year
customer_reviews.text: After just over 1 year (just after the warranty expired) of hanging in front of my front porch, the top spinning bearing has rusted in place.
customer_reviews.author: David Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Works well, flag never tangles!
customer_reviews.text: I love this flag pole! I've had it for a month and a half and have only had to untangle the flag once. It really works as described!
customer_reviews.author: Ali Y

customer_reviews.title: Almost
customer_reviews.text: The design was probably the best I’ve seen for not having your flag tangle itself up. However, the pole was so flimsy it had a structural failure in the first two days when we had some wind and rain. Update: I ordered a second one hoping the first was a fluke. It broke in half the first day. I think It would be a great design if they used metal instead of plastic and a better quality aluminum.
customer_reviews.author: Kimo K.

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Right product for the right price. Works as described. Keeps the flag flying! My top ring lasted 18 months (broke in a gale wind this weekend). Pole stayed up, lower ring stayed put, just the skinny top ring broke. Easy fix and we'll be flying again.
customer_reviews.author: Jp

customer_reviews.title: it spins very nicely, but the cap at the top is plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty is a generous word for this, it probably weighs less than a pound. it spins very nicely, but the cap at the top is plastic and there is no way to change it. This is a very run of the mill economy flagpole.
customer_reviews.author: Milo M

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Flag still gets tangled often, this isn't good at all false advertising :(...
customer_reviews.author: D0UBLEO76

customer_reviews.title: Best flagpole of this type we ever had
customer_reviews.text: Flagpole is strong, and stays new looking a long time. The spin around feature is great- much less untwisting of any flag used- Flags hang freely and far better with this design.
customer_reviews.author: S L Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be really great and well made
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be really great and well made. There are bearings in top swivel. Hopefully it will not break where the two 3' poles screw together to join and form a 6' pole. Had lost of wind last few days- everything works great..
customer_reviews.author: acanal

customer_reviews.title: OK, but not ideal.
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT spin freely at the top end. Have tried to modify the attaching point to make it reliable, but the flag often gets tangled. Have filed the aluminum bracket and then sprayed it with WD40 from time to time, but not greatly pleased with the "maintenance" required to keep the flag from getting tangled in windy conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph H Markle

customer_reviews.title: Not as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I have had this flag pole for 6 months as a replacement for a wooden flag pole that swiveled, as that pole was old and at times did not swivel and the flag would wrap around it. First, this flag pole was the one with the gold colored top. Within, a month, the gold was gone, and it now is silver. The more annoying thing is that this pole, on a daily basis, does not swivel, and I have to unwrap the flag from around the pole on a continual basis. I was better off with the old wooden pole.
customer_reviews.author: KennyR

customer_reviews.title: Came Apart
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you buy some Gorilla Glue to have on hand when the pole comes apart. The pole has an outer and an inner pole. After the outer part that was in the holder stayed and the inner part of the pole ended up on the lawn, I had to glue the bottom outer part of the pole back on to inner part of the pole. It was easy, I just slid the two parts back together with lots of Gorilla Glue. I guess it was better than snapping apart.
customer_reviews.author: Reanna

customer_reviews.title: very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Works well in changing breeze directions, however I would not use this or any other similar item in a strong wind.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT C.

customer_reviews.title: they make the best pair I have seen to display a 3 X ...
customer_reviews.text: I live in a very windy region of Oklahoma. This is the only flagpole, that I have used, that does not let the flag tangle up in the wind. The entire top section of this flag pole spins and does not let the flag tangle up what so ever. I also bought the aluminum flag pole holder. Together, they make the best pair I have seen to display a 3 X 5 flag. I am going to buy more of these.
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN F.

customer_reviews.title: Very strong, great looking and tangle free
customer_reviews.text: Units look very professional. They have withstood several high winds, 30 mph +. Rotating sleeve is a great feature and keeps the flag from tangling up.
customer_reviews.author: hardrocko

customer_reviews.title: horrible, do not order
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 of these and all 3 came in broken. Now I have to go to the time and effort to package up to return.!!!! Parts made of plastic and 3 broken in the same place. Glad they came in broken. If they broke so easily I can't imagine that they would last long outside in the wind. DONT BUY THESE.
customer_reviews.author: JUDITH RAYMER

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic rings will break
customer_reviews.text: Started off great. Then the plastic rings that hold the flag broke. Tangle free works awesome until the plastic breaks. Currently searching for a more durable pole
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. Just what we needed to put up our raiders flag. Will post a pic soon. Super easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Nicole Valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: No more twisted flags
customer_reviews.text: For years, I had the kind of pole that didn’t rotate and my flags would wrap around it and stay that way. I finally got this one, where the top half rotates. GAME CHANGER.
customer_reviews.author: Beowulf

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This flag pole seems to perform well. Within 2 days after putting it up the flag got wrapped around it and I was disappointed. But since then, about 2 weeks with lots of wind, there have been no problems. I'm pleased that it is sturdier than my previous pole.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Flags don't get tangled with this flagpole!
customer_reviews.text: I used to hate how I was always untangling my flag that came with a standard (cheap) pole. The pivoting clips on this pole allow the flag to fly in the breeze without wrapping around the pole! Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Millner

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: We have the U.S. Flag and the Texas Flag mounted on these poles, and they are doing well.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good....
customer_reviews.text: This flag pole is just as described. The two pieces screw together relatively easy and the item is attractive and strong. The one negative is the clips that are provided to hold the flag don't easily go over the grommets. I was able to get one of the clips to slide over the fabric of the flag and into the grommet hole, but not the other one. I ended up replacing the clips with some small carabiners and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K.

customer_reviews.title: I live in a place where we get some strong winds and the pole still does very well.
customer_reviews.text: I live in a place where we get some strong winds and the pole still does very well. I would definitely recommend this pole.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey S. Worrell

customer_reviews.title: This pole really does work!
customer_reviews.text: This pole is great and it really does keep the flag from tangling. The only problem I experienced was that the two pieces don't screw tightly together. The seller kindly replaced the pole, but the same thing happened on the new pole. However -- I'm going to keep it and just hope the two pieces stay together.
customer_reviews.author: SJM

customer_reviews.title: Better options
customer_reviews.text: Pole is not as thick as I thought it would be for a 6 ft pole. Shakes ALOT even with low wind
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 6-8 months, now it’s constantly tangled, the top doesn’t spin and the two poles don’t even screw together anymore.
customer_reviews.author: pksboop

customer_reviews.title: Connectors to flag seem to be cheap plastic.  Broke in less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: Headline says it all. I thought this would be great for my flag, but lasted less than a year. Plastic connectors snapped. And didn't really keep flag from getting tangled.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer143

customer_reviews.title: Great product, would order again...If i needed 2 flagpoles!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize when we ordered this flag that the top half spun around to keep the flag from winding around it. They also had clips to attach the flag, both on top and bottom. The only complaint I would have is that the bottom clip is anchored with a plastic screw. The screw was bent when we received it, but it still anchored it, so no big deal. If anyone needs a flagpole, I highly recommend this one!!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough for my 3X5 flag
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it didn't tangle much, but first big wind the pole bent and broke into 3 pieces. Going back to a wooden pole.
customer_reviews.author: Kickstand

customer_reviews.title: Excellent This was a replacement for the one that wore ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent This was a replacement for the one that wore out.
customer_reviews.author: Joan  E.  Gulick

customer_reviews.title: Caveat Emptor. If you want to fly the Stars and Stripes, buy a different flag pole.
customer_reviews.text: Despite the description after about a month the shaft joint began to rust which means the flag would wrap around itself every time the wind blew. The poke is now just collecting dust and rust in my garage.
customer_reviews.author: Robb Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Cool design but...
customer_reviews.text: I like the design, the flag does not tangle or get wrapped around the pole, reason for three stars is that I don't think this poles can survive winds stronger the 30-35 mph, on windy days here in the SW I have to take it down, I'm afraid it would bend.
customer_reviews.author: Juan M Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Really not heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I bought two poles for our flags. They worked initially and lasted about 2 years, and then the clips broke and then one of the poles bent and snapped. Not very heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M. O'Day

customer_reviews.title: Good flag pole.
customer_reviews.text: Flag pole is heavy duty, but bent in a large wind storm... Also, the flag still gets wrapped around it, but not as much as the old one.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Good service
customer_reviews.text: My old flag pole broke so I ordered a new one. I was really impressed with the pole. i am a retired veteran and fly the flag 24 - 7. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tony T

customer_reviews.title: Clips keep flag constantly unfurled- nice!
customer_reviews.text: Has held up nicely, mind you I live in LA and we don’t often get gale force winds, but will see once the Santa Ana winds come through whether it stands the test of some gusty wind.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Curiel

customer_reviews.title: No More Twisted, Shredded Flag
customer_reviews.text: This flag pole is exactly as advertised. We have had some pretty gusty winds these last few weeks and it is still holding”Old Glory” proudly and untwisted. Thank you to the person who had that inspiration.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M. Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Tangle Free Flagpole
customer_reviews.text: These work great. I have not used this brand previously but the principle solves the problem
customer_reviews.author: Amazon fan

customer_reviews.title: Tangles/Paint peeling
customer_reviews.text: Still flips in wind and tangles flag. Not as described. This flag pole is the worst I have every purchased The wind has already broken this pole. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Hung flag and pole bent and broke with wind. I’ll find another product as no way here to contact manufacturet/seller
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Old Glory never gets tangled anymore!
customer_reviews.text: I used to untangle my flag EVERY day after work. I've only had to do it once in the month I've flown Old Glory on this pole! Simple design, works well, and I will be buying more in the future as needed.
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased. The length is perfect at 5 feet
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY! A pole that actually keeps the flag flying. Hardly ever gets tangled and untangles itself. Have always had to use a long stick to untangle the flag with other poles. Very pleased. The length is perfect at 5 feet. Did great thought the Nor'easter we had. Very pleased. Looks like it will hold up. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more twisted flag
customer_reviews.text: After a couple years of constantly untwisting the flag in front of our house when it got wrapped up from the cheap pole that came with it, this fixed it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Brian L.

customer_reviews.title: 2 Out Of 3 Ain’t Bad?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 of these for porch flags. The concept sounded great, and they work really well. They would get a 5 except one of the poles had a gap that must have let water in. After the first rain, the ball bearings rusted and the pole no longer spins so it’s useless as far as functionality. The other two have a smaller gap, and work amazing. 5/5 if all 3 has worked...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Had a little wind, nothing to write home about, but this did NOT hold up, and I woke up in the morning to my flag being in a tree because the hooks broke. Not impressed, especially since I live in a state that our wind is more like a breeze, especially since we didn’t even have a wind warning and nothing else was touched in the neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a fair price.
customer_reviews.text: This product is very simple and there are many companies selling them. Put if you install them correctly you will achieve the results you are looking for. I used mine for putting light curtains on our new sun porch. There was only 3/4 of an inch space and these worked very well.
customer_reviews.author: E. Venticinque

product_meta.title: American Signature Flag Pole 5 Ft - Aluminum Spinning Tangle Free Flagpole for Sale - Outdoor Wall Mount Flag Pole for Residential or Commercial. (Silver, 5')
product_meta.description:
Color:Silver| Size:5'
Displaying a flag on your home tells the world what's important to you. Unfortunately, if you're using a standard flag pole, your flag will loop over itself, turning into a twisted mess. 

Best Tangle Free Flag Pole: The American Signature Tangle Free Flag Pole uses precisely machined ball bearings to rotate the top part of pole and keep your flag unfurled no matter which way the wind is blowing. This rotating anti-wrap flag pole will extend the life of your flag and protects from tears. 

Multi Use Flag Pole: Designed to be used with 2.5x4 or 3x5 ft grommet flags or 2.5' x 4' or 3' x 5' sleeved house banner flags. 

Rust Free & Wind Resistant: This Heavy Duty flag pole is made out of Rust Free "Brushed Aluminum" and stainless steel mounting clips that won't make rust spots on your flag. This flagpole was also developed to be Wind Resistant and will withstand all weather outdoor elements. 

Available in white or silver finish: White pole comes with a golden ball topper and silver pole comes with a silver color ball topper. 2 mount rings (one fixed on the top and the second one for the bottom to accommodate different size flags) with stainless steel clips are included. Bracket is not included. 

Two piece design makes installation quick and easy:You just need to screw top and bottom pieces together.

100% Satisfaction Guarantee: We strive to meet our customers’ expectations. If there is anything wrong with your new flag pole, please contact us immediately! If you find a piece missing, damaged, or defective, we will send you a new one right away! Your new flag pole comes with a 1 YEAR WARRANTY and the Amazon A to Z Guarantee.
feature_bullets: ★ IS YOUR FLAG BLOWN INTO A TANGLED MESS? Say goodbye to unwrapping your tangled flag ever again when you purchase this spinning flag pole! The American Signature Tangle Free Flagpole uses precisely machined ball bearings to rotate the pole and keep your flag unfurled no matter which way the wind is blowing. This rotating anti-wrap flag pole will extend the life of your flag and protect it from tears and frays.
★ Multi Use Flag Pole: 5 Feet Long 1 Inch Diameter, Designed for 2.5'x4' or 3'x5' Flags with Grommets or Sleeved House Banner Flags.

★ Rust Free & Wind Resistant: This flag pole is made out of Rust Free "Brushed Aluminum" and Aluminum Carabiners that won't make rust spots on your flag. This flagpole was also developed to be Wind Resistant and will withstand all weather outdoor elements.
★ Available in white or silver finish: White pole comes with a golden ball topper and silver pole comes with a silver color ball topper. Mounting bracket sold separately.

★ 100% Satisfaction Guarantee: We strive to meet our customers’ expectations. If there is anything wrong with your new flag pole, please contact us immediately! If you find a piece missing, damaged, or defective, we will send you a new one right away! Your new flag pole comes with a 1 YEAR WARRANTY and the Amazon A to Z Guarantee.
